data.title: Glad Tidings
data.meta_description: "You light the world, in all your majesty!" These are the first lines from the chorus of the title song from the new Christmas collection, You Light the…
data.text: "You light the world, in all your majesty!" These are the first lines from the chorus of the title song from the new Christmas collection, You Light the World. Bradley Knight has teamed again with the worship ministry of First Baptist Church, Odessa, TX to bring you this collection that is perfect for churches of any size and style to use to celebrate Christ’s birth. With songs sequenced in Christmas story order, narration could easily be written, or scripture read to make a musical out of this collection. As has been the standard in past books form First Odessa, you will find the mix of songs to be a blend of brand new and sugar sticks, up-tempo gospel to Gaither Homecoming. If you are looking for a Christmas collection that will please all palates this Christmas, You Light the World is the perfect choice for you!
